messages.message: SDK expects timestamps of Run object to be int — https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/63581
I don’t understand the last PR
The first one left a comment
We should instead change the API to always return integer
If someone uses the API directly - then they expect it to be integer always not string
Yes, that is what the last PR does - it makes sure to always return int
Do you want to huddle? - Maybe I’m missing something
